com.cba.simulator.bootstrap

Class SimulatorBootstrap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cba.simulator.bootstrap.SimulatorBootstrap

  • public class SimulatorBootstrap
extends java.lang.Object
    Acts as triggering point of SimulatorBootstrap.

    This class is responsible for the following,

    • validate the input arguments.
    • process the input arguments and set the values to input object.
    Author:
    Gills Antony

      • SimulatorBootstrap

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main Method - Entry point method to SimulatorBootstrap.

        Accepts user input arguments as follows,

        • No arguments - simulate future environment data for 1 week from today.
        • One Date argument (Date in "yyyy-MM-dd" format) - simulate future environment data for the input date.
        • Two Date arguments (Date in "yyyy-MM-dd" format) - simulate future environment data for the input date range.
        Parameters:
        args - - user input arguments

      • validateInputArgs

        public static boolean validateInputArgs(java.lang.String[] args)
                                 throws BusinessException,
                                        UtilsException
        method to validate input arguments
        Parameters:
        args - - user input arguments
        Returns:
        true if validation is successful
        Throws:
        BusinessException - if input arguments are not correct.
        UtilsException - if util function fails.

      • processInputArgs

        public static SimulatorInputDTO processInputArgs(java.lang.String[] args)
                                          throws UtilsException
        method to process input arguments. Input arguments are processed to form input data object.
        Parameters:
        args - - maximum of two arguments. All arguments should be date.
        Returns:
        input object with data based on user input.
        Throws:
        UtilsException - if any Util function fails.
